department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程旨在拓展學生對於認知神經科學最新研究與發展的認識。學生將有機會學習如何組織與進行學術活動，例如研討會和討論會，以及其他學術活動的技能。課程將邀請認知神經科學領域的傑出講者，分享最新的研究，讓學生向領域內的專家學習。此外，學生還將有機會發展和精進其報告與展示技巧，有效傳達研究成果與想法。
goal.en: The aim of this seminar course is to extend students‘ knowledge of the most up-to-date research and developments in cognitive neuroscience. Students will have the opportunity to learn how to organize and conduct academic activities, including conferences and discussions, which are essential skills for a successful academic career. The course will also feature distinguished speakers from the field, providing valuable insights and fostering learning from leading experts. Additionally, students will have the chance to develop and refine their presentation skills, which are crucial for effectively communicating research findings and ideas.

outline.ch: 每週我們將邀請認知神經科學、腦科學和心理學相關領域的傑出講者來與課堂分享他們的科學研究成果。這些專家也會分享他們的職業經驗，提供對其職業道路和挑戰的寶貴見解。討論的主題將涵蓋從基礎科學到在臨床和教育環境中的實際應用，為學生提供這些學科理論與實務方面的全面理解。學生將被分成小組，積極參與這些活動的組織工作，讓他們在學術環境中獲得活動策劃和管理的實際經驗。
outline.en: Each week, we will invite distinguished speakers from fields related to cognitive neuroscience, brain science, and psychology to share their scientific work with the class. These experts will also discuss their career experiences, offering valuable insights into the paths and challenges of their professional journeys. The topics covered will range from foundational scientific research to practical applications in clinical and educational settings, providing students with a comprehensive understanding of both the theoretical and practical aspects of these disciplines. Students will be divided into groups and actively involved in organizing these events, giving them hands-on experience in event planning and management within an academic context.
